name: juryanalyst
0:
”Alexa, start jury analyst”
”Alexa, open jury analyst”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jury analyst
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You have discovered all of the information and themes for your case. You have learned what biases and characteristics will have an effect in court. You have defined the best and worst jurors and asked all the right questions to weed them out. Now what do you do with all of this information? How can you take all of this a step further to be absolutely sure you know the jurors sitting on your panel? Take background research to the next level with Individual Juror Research and Ranking.

Enable this skill and learn from the experts.
